content.value:
Would anybody like to be friends with me this year?

You don’t have to do anything, and I’ll never message you first. It’s basically the same as not being friends if I’m honest although I WILL like your tweets and get overly defensive of you on Twitter. 

Thank u
content.html: Would anybody like to be friends with me this year? You don’t have to do anything, and I’ll never message you first. It’s basically the same as not being friends if I’m honest although I WILL like your tweets and get overly defensive of you on Twitter. Thank u
